cards.name: Sorin, Lord of Innistrad
cards.text:
[+1]: Create a 1/1 black Vampire creature token with lifelink.
[−2]: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +1/+0."
[−6]: Destroy up to three target creatures and/or other planeswalkers. Return each card put into a graveyard this way to the battlefield under your control.

foreignPrintings.name: イニストラードの君主、ソリン

cards.name: Doomed Traveler
cards.text: When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
cards.flavor: He vowed he would never rest until he reached his destination. He doesn't know how right he was.

cards.name: Vampire Lacerator
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life unless an opponent has 10 or less life.
cards.flavor: The lacerators cut themselves before each hunt. They must feed before the sun rises or bleed to death.

cards.name: Wall of Omens
cards.text:
Defender
When Wall of Omens enters the battlefield, draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"I search for a vision of Zendikar that does not include the Eldrazi."
-Expedition journal entry

cards.name: Child of Night
cards.text: Lifelink
cards.flavor: Sins that would be too gruesome in the light of day are made more pleasing in the dark of night.

cards.name: Duskhunter Bat
cards.text:
Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Flying
cards.flavor: The swamps go silent at its approach, but it still hears the heartbeat of the prey within.

cards.name: Mesmeric Fiend
cards.text:
When Mesmeric Fiend enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card.
When Mesmeric Fiend leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Gatekeeper of Malakir
cards.text:
Kicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} as you cast this spell.)
When Gatekeeper of Malakir enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, target player sacrifices a creature.
cards.flavor: "You may enter the city-once the toll is paid."

cards.name: Twilight Drover
cards.text:
Whenever a creature token leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Twilight Drover.
{2}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Twilight Drover: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

cards.name: Bloodrage Vampire
cards.text: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
cards.flavor: The most genteel facades hide the most abominable desires.

cards.name: Fiend Hunter
cards.text:
When Fiend Hunter enters the battlefield, you may exile another target creature.
When Fiend Hunter leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

cards.name: Vampire Nighthawk
cards.text: Flying, deathtouch, lifelink

cards.name: Mausoleum Guard
cards.text: When Mausoleum Guard dies, create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.
cards.flavor: "Ghoulcallers trying to get in, geists trying to get out . . . . This duty is never dull."

cards.name: Phantom General
cards.text: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1.
cards.flavor: After his death, the general was reunited with fallen soldiers from over thirty of his campaigns.

cards.name: Vampire Outcasts
cards.text:
Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.)
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

cards.name: Revenant Patriarch
cards.text:
When Revenant Patriarch enters the battlefield, if {W} was spent to cast it, target player skips their next combat phase.
Revenant Patriarch can't block.

cards.name: Sengir Vampire
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.
cards.flavor: Empires rise and fall, but evil is eternal.

cards.name: Butcher of Malakir
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Butcher of Malakir or another creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
cards.flavor: His verdict is always guilty. His sentence is always death.

cards.name: Vampire's Bite
cards.text:
Kicker {2}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B} as you cast this spell.)
Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

cards.name: Decompose
cards.text: Exile up to three target cards from a single graveyard.
cards.flavor:
"Sheesh! How am I supposed to make a decent living around here?"
-Cabal grave robber

cards.name: Sorin's Thirst
cards.text: Sorin's Thirst deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.
cards.flavor: "All your steel won't protect you if your will is weak."

cards.name: Urge to Feed
cards.text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. You may tap any number of untapped Vampire creatures you control. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those Vampires.

cards.name: Zealous Persecution
cards.text: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 and creatures your opponents control get -1/-1.
cards.flavor:
"Jharic returned from Grixis changed, a haunted look in her eyes. She destroyed them with an unholy glee that made me shudder."
-Knight-Captain Wyhorn

cards.name: Lingering Souls
cards.text:
Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.
Flashback {1}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor: The murdered inhabitants of Hollowhenge impart to the living the terror they felt in death.

cards.name: Mortify
cards.text: Destroy target creature or enchantment.
cards.flavor: Many who cross Sorin's path come down with a sudden and fatal case of being-in-the-way-of-a-millennia-old-vampire.

cards.name: Spectral Procession
cards.text: Create three 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.
cards.flavor:
"I need never remember my past associates, my victims, my mistakes. Innistrad preserves them all for me."
-Sorin Markov

cards.name: Unmake
cards.text: Exile target creature.
cards.flavor: A gwyllion's favorite trap is the vanity mirror. A bewitched piece of glass traps the looker's soul and does away with the body.

cards.name: Ancient Craving
cards.text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
cards.flavor: Knowledge demands sacrifice.

cards.name: Mark of the Vampire
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink.
cards.flavor:
"My 'condition' is a trial. The weak are consumed by it. The strong transcend it."
-Sorin Markov

cards.name: Field of Souls
cards.text: Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

cards.name: Absorb Vis
cards.text:
Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.
Basic landcycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

cards.name: Death Grasp
cards.text: Death Grasp deals X damage to any target. You gain X life.
cards.flavor: Plate mail, the skin of the chest, the rib cage, the heart-all useless against the mage who can reach directly for the soul.

cards.name: Evolving Wilds
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
cards.flavor: Without the interfering hands of civilization, nature will always shape itself to its own needs.

cards.name: Tainted Field
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}. Activate only if you control a Swamp.

cards.name: Tibalt, the Fiend-Blooded
cards.text:
[+1]: Draw a card, then discard a card at random.
[−4]: Tibalt, the Fiend-Blooded deals damage equal to the number of cards in target player's hand to that player.
[−6]: Gain control of all creatures until end of turn. Untap them. They gain haste until end of turn.

foreignPrintings.name: 悪鬼の血脈、ティボルト

cards.name: Goblin Arsonist
cards.text: When Goblin Arsonist dies, you may have it deal 1 damage to any target.
cards.flavor: With great power comes great risk of getting yourself killed.

cards.name: Scorched Rusalka
cards.text: {R}, Sacrifice a creature: Scorched Rusalka deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
cards.flavor: Each small blaze she sets jogs her memory, letting her piece together the mystery of her own fiery end.

cards.name: Reassembling Skeleton
cards.text: {1}{B}: Return Reassembling Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
cards.flavor:
"They may show up with the wrong thigh bone or mandible, but they always show up."
-Zul Ashur, lich lord

cards.name: Ashmouth Hound
cards.text: Whenever Ashmouth Hound blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Ashmouth Hound deals 1 damage to that creature.
cards.flavor: Its fiery paws make it easy to track, which is very useful when you want to go in exactly the opposite direction.

cards.name: Hellspark Elemental
cards.text:
Trample, haste
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Hellspark Elemental.
Unearth {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Vithian Stinger
cards.text:
{T}: Vithian Stinger deals 1 damage to any target.
Unearth {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

foreignPrintings.name: ヴィティアのとげ刺し

cards.name: Shambling Remains
cards.text:
Shambling Remains can't block.
Unearth {B}{R} ({B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Coal Stoker
cards.text: When Coal Stoker enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, add {R}{R}{R}.
cards.flavor:
"The day is mine! I sent three such creatures against my foe, then watched as my magefire popped her soldiers like overripe spleenfruits."
-Dobruk the Unstable, pyromancer

cards.name: Lavaborn Muse
cards.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has two or fewer cards in hand, Lavaborn Muse deals 3 damage to that player.
cards.flavor:
"Her voice is disaster, painful and final."
-Matoc, lavamancer

cards.name: Mad Prophet
cards.text:
Haste
{T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
cards.flavor: "There's no heron in the moon! It's a shrew, a five-legged shrew, with a voice like whispering thunder!"

cards.name: Hellrider
cards.text:
Haste
Whenever a creature you control attacks, Hellrider deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.
cards.flavor:
"Behind every devil's mayhem lurks a demon's scheme."
-Rem Karolus, Blade of the Inquisitors

cards.name: Skirsdag Cultist
cards.text: {R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Skirsdag Cultist deals 2 damage to any target.
cards.flavor: "Within blood is life. Within life is fire. Within fire is the path to our masters' glory!"

cards.name: Corpse Connoisseur
cards.text:
When Corpse Connoisseur enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card, put that card into your graveyard, then shuffle.
Unearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Scourge Devil
cards.text:
When Scourge Devil enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
Unearth {2}{R} ({2}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Gang of Devils
cards.text: When Gang of Devils dies, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.
cards.flavor:
"Well, how could I know they'd explode?"
-Gregel, township militia

cards.name: Bump in the Night
cards.text:
Target opponent loses 3 life.
Flashback {5}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor: It's not just the wind. It's not all in your head. And it's definitely something to worry about.

cards.name: Blazing Salvo
cards.text: Blazing Salvo deals 3 damage to target creature unless that creature's controller has Blazing Salvo deal 5 damage to them.
cards.flavor: Barbarians equate courage with the ability to endure pain.

cards.name: Faithless Looting
cards.text:
Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor: "Avacyn has abandoned us! We have nothing left except what we can take!"

cards.name: Flame Slash
cards.text: Flame Slash deals 4 damage to target creature.
cards.flavor: After millennia asleep, the Eldrazi had forgotten about Zendikar's fiery temper and dislike of strangers.

cards.name: Geistflame
cards.text:
Geistflame deals 1 damage to any target.
Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor: Innistrad pyromancers find their best raw materials in the fury of the dead.

cards.name: Pyroclasm
cards.text: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.
cards.flavor: Chaos does not choose its enemies.

cards.name: Recoup
cards.text:
Target sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (Mana cost includes color.)
Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Terminate
cards.text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor:
"I've seen death before. My mother succumbing to illness, my comrades bleeding on the battlefield . . . But I'd never seen anything as dreadful as that."
-Taani, berserker of Etlan

cards.name: Strangling Soot
cards.text:
Destroy target creature with toughness 3 or less.
Flashback {5}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor:
"What good is your blade without your breath?"
-Greht, Gathan warlord

cards.name: Browbeat
cards.text: Any player may have Browbeat deal 5 damage to them. If no one does, target player draws three cards.
cards.flavor:
"Pained defiance or shameful surrender-every reaction is a pleasant surprise."
-Tibalt

cards.name: Breaking Point
cards.text: Any player may have Breaking Point deal 6 damage to them. If no one does, destroy all creatures. Creatures destroyed this way can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor: "Enough!"

cards.name: Sulfuric Vortex
cards.text:
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Sulfuric Vortex deals 2 damage to that player.
If a player would gain life, that player gains no life instead.

cards.name: Blightning
cards.text: Blightning deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. That player or that planeswalker's controller discards two cards.
cards.flavor: In the spirit of inquiry, Tibalt applied a battery of agony spells. They yielded nothing on the vampire's whereabouts, but the screams were reward enough.

cards.name: Flame Javelin
cards.text:
({2/R} can be paid with any two mana or with {R}. This card's mana value is 6.)
Flame Javelin deals 4 damage to any target.
cards.flavor: Gyara Spearhurler would have been renowned for her deadly accuracy, if it weren't for her deadly accuracy.

cards.name: Torrent of Souls
cards.text: Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield if {B} was spent to cast this spell. Creatures target player controls get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn if {R} was spent to cast this spell. (Do both if {B}{R} was spent.)

cards.name: Devil's Play
cards.text:
Devil's Play deals X damage to any target.
Flashback {X}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor: A devil's hands are never idle.

cards.name: Akoum Refuge
cards.text:
Akoum Refuge enters the battlefield tapped.
When Akoum Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

cards.name: Rakdos Carnarium
cards.text:
Rakdos Carnarium enters the battlefield tapped.
When Rakdos Carnarium enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {B}{R}.
